resources.string: To detect suspicious calls, we need permissions to read phone state and call logs.
To allow calls from contacts only, we need permissions to read contacts.

Detecting unwanted calls will not function without any of requested permissions. Permission to read call logs is required to receive phone number from incoming call, while the permissino for reading phone state is required to receive incoming call requests.

Some or all requested permissions have been denied. If you want to grant required permissions, you\'ll have to open application info where you can update your given permissions. Would you like to open app info of this application?
Allowing calls only from contacts is not available unless requested permission is given. Permission to read contacts is required to find a contact that has a phone number from incoming call.

Requested permission for reading contacts has been denied. If you want to grant required permission, you\'ll have to open application info where you can update your given permissions. Would you like to open app info of this application?
Are you sure you want to delete this rule?
This phone number might not be valid. Are you sure you want to save changes?
